author: BBC News
title: UK weather: Amber warning for snow as freezing cold snap continues
description: Forecasters say temperatures will fall below zero overnight and there will be more snow and ice in some areas on Thursday.
content:
Areas from London to Shetland saw snow on Wednesday.
There were dozens of school closures in north-east Scotland and the Highlands and road closures including on the Woodhead Pass between Hollingworâ€¦ [+928 chars]
